div.style: display: flex; align-items: flex-start; flex-direction: row; justify-content: center
display: flex; position: relative; align-items: center; flex-direction: row

img.style: width: 48px; height: 48px; margin-top: 1px; margin-right: 8px; align-self: center

div.style: display: flex; align-items: flex-start; flex-direction: column; white-space: nowrap
display: flex; position: relative; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; font-weight: bold; line-height: 24px

label.style: margin-top: 1px; margin-right: 3px; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; color: #e6000000; font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold; align-self: center
display: {endRoadShow}; margin-top: 1px; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; color: #e6000000; font-size: 24px; margin-right: 0px; font-weight: bold; align-self: center

div.style: display: flex; position: relative; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; margin-top: 2px; line-height: 20px
display: {eleEyeShow}; position: relative; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; margin-top: 2px; line-height: 20px

label.style: color: #ff4b4b; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; align-self: center
margin-right: 15px; color: #99000000; font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal; align-self: center

div.style: display: {dynamicEyeShow}; position: relative; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; margin-top: 2px; line-height: 20px

label.style: color: #ff4b4b; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; align-self: center
color: #99000000; font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal; margin-right: 0px; align-self: center
